sentences.en: Dill and Jem dived beside me.
sentences.cn: 迪尔和吉姆在我身边向前猛冲.

sentences.en: Dill blushed and Jem told me to hush.
sentences.cn: 迪尔脸红了,查姆要我住嘴.

sentences.en: Dill was comforted , but Jem and I weren't.
sentences.cn: 迪文放心了, 可杰姆和我却麻烦了.

sentences.en: Dill's eyes flickered at Jem, and Jem looked at the floor.
sentences.cn: 迪尔望着杰姆眨了眨了眼, 杰姆却看着地下.

sentences.en: I think you'll be sorry for being so stubborn about Jem.
sentences.cn: 我想你自会为对杰姆的偏见感到抱歉的.

sentences.en: I'm not going to be affronted either for myself or Jem.
sentences.cn: 我既不生自己的气,也不想生杰姆的气.

sentences.en: In later years , I somtimes wondered exactly what made Jem do it.
sentences.cn: 我们长大以后, 我有时候百思不得其解,不知究竟是什么原因使杰姆当时那么干.

sentences.en: Jem decided there was no point in quibbling and was silent.
sentences.cn: 杰姆觉得跟他磨嘴皮子没意思,于是便不再做声了.

sentences.en: Jem pressed the little hand he held between his own workhardened ones.
sentences.cn: 杰姆把那只小手抓在他生了老茧的手掌中间,紧紧地握了一下.
杰姆呆呆地坐在那儿,惘然若失.

sentences.en: Jem was a poor mechanic, with a mother and aunt to keep.
sentences.cn: 杰姆是个穷苦的机工, 他还得赡养母亲和姑母.

sentences.en: Jem was full of beans after a long sleep.
sentences.cn: 杰姆好好睡了一觉之后又变得精力充沛了。

sentences.en: Poor Jem! His raven hair, was that too to have its influence against him?
sentences.cn: 可怜的杰姆! 连他那乌黑的头发, 都会叫人对他发生恶感 吗 ?

sentences.en: Poor soul. I only mean for Jem's sake.
sentences.cn: 这妇人当真可怜! 不过我是为杰姆着想.

trans.tran_cn: [男子名] 杰姆 James的昵称
